title: Possession of Cocaine in small quantities
description: Possession of up to 4 units of cocaine.

title: Possession of Cocaine in moderate quantities
description: Possession of 5 to 8 units of cocaine.

title: Possession of Cocaine with intent to supply
description: Possession of cocaine over 8 units.

title: Production of Cocaine
description: The process of manufacturing cocaine using modulated equipment.

title: Possession of cannabis in small quantities
description: Possession of cannabis up to 10 units.

title: Possession of cannabis in moderate quantities
description: Possession of over 11 units of cannabis.

title: Possession of Cannabis with Intent to supply
description: Attempting to sell or purchase cannabis.

title: Cultivation of cannabis in small quantities
description: Growing up to 5 cannabis plants.

title: Cultivation of cannabis in large quantities
description: Growing more than 5 cannabis plants.

title: Production of Cannabis
description: The process of manufacturing Cannabis using modulated equipment.

title: Usage of illicit substances in public
description: Using drugs or alcohol in public.

title: Possession of prohibited items in small quantities
description: Possession of up to 3 illegal items from the illegal item list.

title: Possession of prohibited items in large quantities
description: Possession of more than 3 items from the illegal item list.

title: Sale of prohibited item
description: Selling or purchasing an item from the illegal item list.

title: Possession of infected technology with malicious intent
description: Possession of a USB with a virus.

title: Carrying a weapon without a license
description: Carrying any weapon without a valid weapon license.
notes: Class A Infraction / Confiscation / Revoke gun license

title: Overcarrying
description: Carrying more than the prescribed amount of weapons and ammo allowed in the firearm law.

title: Open Carrying
description: Open Carrying a weapon in public.

title: Possession of any prohibited weapon
description: Possession of a prohibited weapon.

title: Possession of multiple prohibited weapons
description: Possession of more than one prohibited weapon.

title: Brandishing of a weapon
description: Using a weapon to intimidate or threaten a person.

title: Possession of state issued articles
description: Possession of weapons, armour or balaclavas, etc. belonging to a state organization.

title: Discharging a weapon in a public place
description: Shooting a weapon in a public place but not at a person.

title: Distribution of weapons ammunition or state-issued articles
description: Selling or buying weapons, ammo or state issued articles.

title: Production of ammunition
description: The process of manufacturing ammunition using modulated equipment.

title: Non-lethal battery
description: Inflicting bodily harm on a person without using a firearm.

title: Manslaughter
description: Unintentionally killing another person(s).

title: Assault by Threat
description: Verbal assault where a likelihood of the threat's execution is present.

title: Attempted Murder
description: Attempting to kill a person. (Knocked unconscious and revived).

title: Murder through hostile action
description: Killing a person. (Finished a person).

title: Rape and/or Sexual Assault
description: Sexual intercourse against a person's will.

title: Failure to Act
description: Leaving a person to bleed out.

title: Refusal of Duty to Act
description: Refusing to act in the interests of the general public by a state employee.

title: Failure to act by a Public servant
description: A Public servant leaving a person to bleed out.

title: Abandonment of a civilian by a public servant
description: Leaving a person whom you were in charge of on their own where they cannot look after themselves or are vulnerable.

title: Abduction
description: Taking someone by force or deception.

title: Kidnapping
description: Taking someone and holding them captive.

title: Taking a hostage
description: Taking someone in exchange for something or someone else.

title: Human Trafficking
description: Taking people by force, coercion or fraud to facilitate labor or commercial sex act.

title: Violation of privacy
description: Breaching, infringing or violating the confidentiality or right to privacy.

title: Unlawful Detention
description: Detaining of a citizen by a public servant where the reason was either unclear or unwarranted.

title: Street Harassment
description: Rude, derogatory, unwelcome comments, whistles or any other unwelcome form of sexual verbal interaction.

title: Sexual Harassment
description: Harassment of the sexual kind.

title: Stalking
description: Following or harassing another person causing them to fear injury or death.

title: Hooliganism
description: Massive disturbance of the peace.

title: Rioting or inciting a riot
description: Causing or encouraging the disturbance of peace by three or more people and acting with common intent.

title: Spreading of disease
description: Spreading disease intentionally.

title: Indecent Exposure
description: Showing private areas of the body where it's against decency standards.

title: Provoking
description: Causing someone to act or react in response to annoying or harassment.

title: Engaging in prostitution
description: Buying or selling one's sexual desires.

title: Defamation of character
description: Damaging a person's reputation by slander or libel.
notes: Can ONLY be applied by a Judge after court

title: Harassment of a public servant
description: Harassing a public servant.

title: Document forgery
description: Creating a false document to give appearance of truth.

title: Looting of an Automated Teller Machine (ATM)
description: Robbing an ATM.

title: Theft of property
description: Taking someone's stuff without consent.

title: Fraud
description: Defrauding someone or something.

title: Grand Theft Auto
description: Taking a car without permission.

title: Robbery
description: Theft but with force or threat.

title: False Advertising
description: Publicly distributing an advert that is untrue.

title: Reckless Driving
description: Operating a motor vehicle negligently or knowingly disregarding the safety of others, traffic code or both.

title: Causing injury by dangerous driving
description: Hurting someone using a car.

title: Causing death by dangerous driving
description: Killing someone using a car.

title: Failure to yield to an emergency service vehicle
description: Not stopping for an emergency vehicle with its lights on.

title: Animal abuse causing minor harm
description: Hurting an animal deliberately.

title: Animal abuse causing major harm
description: Significantly hurting an animal deliberately.

title: Animal abuse resulting in death
description: Killing an animal.

title: Attempted Suicide
description: Trying to kill one's self.
notes: Take to EMS for mental health check and can swap star for 10K Fine

title: Conspiracy to commit a crime
description: Plotting or conspiring to commit a crime.

title: Vandalism
description: Destroying or damaging belongings of another person.

title: Illegal Fishing
description: Fishing in mirror park.

title: Breach of Contract
description: Breaking the terms of a signed contractual agreement.
notes: Charge will be dropped if fine is paid instead / Class A Infraction instead

title: Entrapment
description: Tricking someone into committing a crime to secure their prosecution.
notes: Can ONLY be applied by a Judge after court

title: Installation of temporary structure without a permit
description: Putting a barricade down without a permit.

title: Installation of temporary structure on a roadway or path
description: Putting a barricade down on a road or path with no permit.

title: Participation in terrorism
description: Using violence and intimidation with political aims.

title: Organization of terrorism
description: Organizing and recruiting people for terrorism.

title: Leading a terrorist organization
description: Leading a terrorist organization.

title: Commiting a terrorist act
description: Committing a terrorist act.

title: Creation of a stable armed group
description: Creating a stable group of people with access to weapons with purpose to commit crimes.

title: Banditry
description: Committing organized crime.

title: Obstruction of Justice
description: Willfully interfering with the process of justice and law.

title: Attempted Seizure of Power
description: Attempting to seize power.

title: Trespassing on private property
description: Entering and/or loitering unlawfully upon the land of another person.

title: Trespassing in a State Facility
description: Trespassing but on a state facility behind lockable gates/doors.

title: Breaking and Entering
description: Forcing or otherwise gaining unlawful passage in another's building.

title: Failure to comply
description: Not cooperating with the lawful requests of any state employee.

title: Failure to Identify
description: Not identifying with a state employee after a lawful request.

title: Illegal Gambling
description: Gambling by any means outside of the casino.

title: Impersonating a public Servant
description: Pretending to be a public servant.

title: Impersonating a law enforcement Officer
description: Pretending to be a LEO.

title: Breach of electoral silence
description: Campaigning during active voting times by party members.

title: Breach of electoral silence at the voting booth
description: Campaigning near the voting booth.

title: Blocking a voting site
description: Intentionally blocking or limiting access to the voting booths.

title: Illegal persuasion of votes
description: Trying to get people to vote for someone in exchange of something.

title: Battery of a public servant
description: Inflicting bodily injury without firearms on a state employee.

title: Murder or Attempted murder of a public servant
description: Killing or trying to kill a public servant.

title: False reporting
description: Alerting the authorities knowing details are incorrect.

title: Active Bribery
description: Offering money or a favour to a person of trust.

title: Passive Bribery
description: Taking money or a favour given or promised in order to influence judgement or conduct of a person in a position of trust.

title: Quid Pro Quo
description: A favour or advantage given in return for something.

title: Failure to pay fines
description: Being at max fines and not paying them.
notes: No Bail until sum has been paid

title: Evading arrest
description: A person fleeing LEO trying to arrest, detain or investigate them.

title: Assisting the evasion of arrest
description: Assisting a person evade an arrest.

title: Assisting the evasion of arrest by a public servant
description: Assisting a person evade an arrest by a public servant.

title: Street harassment towards a colleague
description: Harassment toward a colleague.

title: Hostile work environment
description: Behaviour that makes a work environment difficult or uncomfortable.

title: Sexual harassment towards a colleague
description: Sexually harassing a colleague.

title: Going absent without leave
description: Being absent from military duties without authority.

title: Provoking a public servant
description: Provoking but to a public servant.

title: Tax Evasion
description: Avoiding taxes.
notes: Variable fine (detailed in warrant up to $100,000)

title: Participation in a cyber attack of the stateâ€™s resources
description: Taking part in a hacker attack on the state's network.

title: Unfair Dismissal
description: The act of dismissing an employee from an organization without following correct protocols or without reason or sufficient evidence to support dismissal.
notes: Variable (prison sentence subject to court verdict/settlement)

title: Disobeying an order
description: Refusing or failing to follow a lawful order given by a superior.

title: Professional Misconduct
description: Conducting oneself in a manner that is professionally unsuitable, potentially dangerous, incompetent, disruptive, abusive or illegal.

title: Sabotage
description: Destroying/damaging weapons, ammo, goods, items of state property to hinder or halt operations by the state.

title: Espionage
description: Spying or watching a person, company, government etc.

title: Conduct Unbecoming
description: Acting against the public interests which harms their standing of professionalism to the public eye.

title: Corruption
description: Dishonest or fraudulent behaviour by a state employee.

title: Disobeying a judicial order
description: Refusing or failing to follow a lawful order given by the Governor, AG or Judge.

title: Disruption of a trial
description: Disrupting court or legal processes in court.

title: Dishonoring a judiciary member
description: Dishonoring the position of a judicial officer during the performance and/or in relation to previous performance.

title: Contempt of court
description: Being disobedient in court.

title: Ill-use of a judiciary permit
description: Misuse of a judicial permit.

title: Forged Evidence
description: Tampering or forging evidence.

title: Perjury
description: Swearing a false oath or falsifying an affirmation to tell the truth, whether spoken or in writing concerning official proceedings.
